long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Selecting from an emoji menu can be tiresome with all the clicking. Now you can use the standard emoji shortcodes like :joy: üòÇ, :poop: üí©, :eggplant: üçÜ, and etc. You can find an exhaustive list of emoji shortcodes here http://www.emoji-cheat-sheet.com/. Some of them are hard to remember, so a helpful toolbox with suggestions will also appear on the bottom right corner of your screen when you begin typing shortcodes. Simple, clutter-free, and easy to use!

Totally free, and totally ad-free. Doesn't track your conversations.

*Supports Facebook chat, Whatsapp Web, Gmail, and common input boxes
